Detailed Description

This class encapsulate a task that can be submitted to the background task manager for processing.

The task function and callback function must be static methods.

This class is for backwards compatibility and should probably not be used in new code.

Member Function Documentation

void CStyleBackgroundTask::doBackgroundTask ( BgTaskManager &  mgr  )  [virtual]

This method is called in a background thread to perform this task.

The task manager is passed in. At the end of the background task, this object is added back as a main thread task, if necessary.

Implements BackgroundTask.

void CStyleBackgroundTask::doMainThreadTask ( BgTaskManager &  mgr  )  [virtual]

This method override BackgroundTask and is called in the main thread once the background task has finished.

Reimplemented from BackgroundTask.
